website_summaries.verdict: This is the phone to get if you want a removable battery, but it fails to live up to its world-changing Swiss Army Knife potential.
pros: The LG G5's unique modular design lets you swap in fun accessories
great rear cameras, expandable storage and a replaceable battery -- a rarity in high-end phones
cons: Although you can swap out some parts, there aren't enough to make this feature compelling
You can only access the phone's app drawer in a specialized theme

customer_reviews.title: Phone is good, Battery is OK, Charger is bad.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is good. Works well including fingerprint reader. Battery is OK. It last about 2 days if you don't use it very much. How if you use text, facebook, twitter, groupme, etc. constantly, it will die about 8 hours or less. (even if you don't watch Youtube or play game.) Charger is bad. It is a compatible charger. It was loose already when it arrived. The dock got bent because of the charger. I ended up paying $45 for fixing the dock and $20 for new authentic charger. I would say it's a good product if the charger was authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Sat

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with phone have had no problems out of it. Great camera, very fast when multi tasking, easily change themes and fonts by using LG smart world and it finally got the 7.0 nougat update. I have read where some give it a poor rating because it has made the app draw obsolete by storing everything to the main layout like iphone does. However there is good news for the ones that still wine over this. LG has an option with the nougat update to allow the app drawer back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Used Like New!
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in near to mint condition. However there was one minor issue with the battery cover. It is a bit slack and battery remained inside the device when I removed the cover. I just had to use a tweezer to pry out the battery. Other than that the device works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DMC STUDIOS

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but glitches
customer_reviews.text: I bout this phone because I have one and its cracked. Im putting my sim card back in my old one because after screwing around with it for a week and spending two hours with ATT to try and fix the problems, I give up. They got it working for a few hours but the com.android settings app keeps crashing so the phone is useless...a piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Steve Elwood

customer_reviews.title: no one would unlock it, gave it away, thx.
customer_reviews.text: wasn't what i expected, ordered unlocked, it was locked, and scratches, not like new.
customer_reviews.author: geoffrey schaar

customer_reviews.title: Problem with it after one time use - returning it
customer_reviews.text: This worked initially, but as the battery was coming to an end, it switched off and would not charge again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GarF

customer_reviews.title: Just like new
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a great price and it is just like new. Not a scratch on it. The camera on this phone is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of problem with this phone didn't like it
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. The only thing that was annoying was that although "Unlocked" it was still an AT&T phone so was preset with AT&T. Work's great with T-Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Mark WOODHEAD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Value
customer_reviews.text: Works great been using it for 4 days now. new works good there doesn't seem to be any issues with it being that it is a 6 yr old phone. finger print reader works great, battery is good
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: But I cannot recommend this phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone twice and both times it would shut off and could not stay on past the initial startup screen. I got refunded for both times this has happened. But I cannot recommend this phone. The second time I bought the phone the up volume button did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can i get a refund
customer_reviews.text: The phone start acting up after 6 months i bought it ...i wouldnt recommend anyone to my this phone
customer_reviews.author: Anice M.

customer_reviews.title: Phone does not work and customer service does not respond
customer_reviews.text: Worst customer service, does not responf to emsil. I bought this phone, on3rd or 4th day left portion of the screen turned blurr.
customer_reviews.author: Vidyasagar Chinthala

customer_reviews.title: Phone missing from the package.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone from EZ Wireless. Recieved the package and the phone was not in the case. Don't buy. It's a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best electronic devices
customer_reviews.text: This is a phone with great features. It has a very nice design. I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Klisman

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: all about a good phone got here yesterday and so far I like it

customer_reviews.title: phone lasted 2 days after return date had expired !.
customer_reviews.text: the phone lasted 2 days after return date had expired !.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Within 1 month the LCD light is trying to go out smh I spent 300.00 on this phone 😡
customer_reviews.author: Shakayla D.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this phone, can use the app drawer like an iPhone or have it like an Android. Love the knock to wake portion of the phone, as well as the finger print scanner. So far it's been good to me and highly recommend to LG users as well as Android users
customer_reviews.author: Pablo R.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these phones in the past year on both phones the power button stopped working after a couple of months making the phones inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very much appreciated for high quality phones.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for great phone, replaced battery now working like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great for the speedy delivery. Good product and neat packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Winand Sogbor

customer_reviews.title: The phone is good for the most part but the sound quality while ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good for the most part but the sound quality while using the phone is terrible. I can barely make out most voicemails. Also the finger print feature doesn't work sometimes, and the screen will come on while on a phone call at times, causing your cheek to push things on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I returned to my LG G4
customer_reviews.text: I returned it and got my G4 back in working order. My Amazon vender had a good price and honored my return.
customer_reviews.author: Edwards_CSG

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy from this seller !!! Phone quit working in less then 3 months ! What a joke
customer_reviews.author: scoffman

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a good phone and runs smoothly
customer_reviews.text: The main issue I have is that the phone I purchased came with only 23GB rather than 32 which is extremely irritating :( it also did not fit my sim card but as it's an old sim card I understand why. Otherwise it's a good phone and runs smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Vexic929

customer_reviews.title: Operation phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome! I love the idea of being able to change out batteries on the fly. Quick and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Hayes

product_meta.title: LG G5 H820 (32GB + 4GB RAM) 5.3" 4G LTE Unlocked GSM Smartphone
product_meta.description: Color:TitanMeet the LG G5 - factory unlocked version! life's good when you play more! transformative design featuring metal unibody construction, slide out battery and modular functionality. Free yourself from boundaries with a 135-degree wide-angle camera that lets you capture more. See the time, date and important notifications anytime without waking the phone via the always-on display.
feature_bullets: Unlocked for all GSM Carriers Worldwide (not unlocked for use with CDMA Carriers). 4G LTE bandS 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 12, 20, 29, 30
5.3-inch IPS LCD Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 4 & LG Optimus UX 5.0 UI
Qualcomm MSM8996 Snapdragon 820 chipset, Quad-core (2x2.15 GHz Kryo + 2x1.6 GHz Kryo)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars61 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
